Congratulations! You have completed Part 1 of the experiment. Part 2 is estimated to take approximately 20-25 minutes.

If you need to take a short rest break before the next phase please do so now. Otherwise, click 'Next' to proceed.

In the next part of the experiment you'll be playing a game that involves making a series of decisions with other players online. Your goal in the game is to earn as much money as possible, as the amount of money you earn will determine how much money you will receive in bonus payment at the end of the game if this experiment portion is selected to determine your bonus pay.

The game will involve a series of rounds with 3 different players that you will be paired with online.

Please note, because we will be pairing you with other players online it may take a few minutes. Please be patient while we do so.
On each round, you will first press the red button, which will pair you with the other player you are playing with on that round.

After you have been paired with a player on that round, you will be given $1.00. You will be asked to decide how much of $1.00 you would like to invest by sending it to the other player and how much to keep for yourself.

Using the slider scale provided, you can decide how much of $1.00 to invest in $0.10 increments.

However, you must make a minimum investment of $0.10, so $0 is not an option.

Otherwise, feel free to invest as much or as little as you would like.
After you decide how much of the $1.00 you want to invest in the other player, your investment will be quadrupled (x4)!
The other player can decide to keep all the money for themselves or give you back some portion of it.

After the other player makes their decision, you will be notified of their decisions and the outcome on that round.

You will then push the button again to play with another player and will be given another dollar.

At the end of the game, if this portion is selected we will randomly select the payout on one of your rounds to determine your bonus payment, so the best strategy is to receive as much money as possible on each round.

If you understand all task instructions please click the “Quiz” button below. You must answer all 3 quiz questions correctly to ensure that you understand the nature of the task. Once you answer all 3 quiz questions correctly you will be paired with other players online. Otherwise, you will be redirected to the task instructions for additional review.
